Text: RE Quallaby Evaluation Agreement Cc Mark Has Quallaby been sent the signed document Thanks Rick Original Message From Greenberg Mark Sent Tuesday September PM To DeZenzo Ray ENRON Cc Jones Tana Shoup Rick Greenberg Mark Subject RE Quallaby Evaluation Agreement Ray The changes made are acceptable I will have two originals circulated internally for signature and forward them to your company for countersignature As I will be out of the office through tomorrow it may be the end of the week before you have the agreements in hand Mark Original Message From DeZenzo Ray ENRON Sent Mon PM To Greenberg Mark Cc Shoup Rick Axbey Tom Borchgrevink Jack Subject RE Quallaby Evaluation Agreement Mark Attached youll find a clean and blackline version of the revised agreement which reflects changes resulting from your items and below The intent behind not changing item is that if Enron were to use the software in one of the identified dangerous or hazardous uses Enron would be on its own If you have any further questions or comments please do not hesitate to contact me at Otherwise please arrange to execute original and fax it to me at for counter signing Thanks Ray Original Message From mailto mailto Sent Monday September AM To Cc Subject RE Quallaby Evaluation Agreement Ray Thanks for the response and the black line Below are my additional comments The reference to Hardware Products needs to be deleted as does the Schedule B It is my understanding that the hardware is provided by a different vendor If it is necessary to reference the hardware as a requirement for running the software programs this should be listed in Schedule A as a specification Paragraph the term its best efforts should be replaced with reasonable efforts and if it is Quallabys position that Enron pursue confidential treatment of the information despite legal requirements to disclosed placed on Enron the reasonable cost for pursuing this protection should be borne by Quallaby Paragraph the change made at the end of the paragraph needs to read BUT SPECIFICALLY EXCLUDING ANY WARRANTIES ASSOCIATED WITH THE INDEMNITY OBLIGATIONS OF SECTION a AND b ABOVE Since neither of the referenced provisions are themselves warranties it is incorrect to reference them in as being warranties Paragraph the following language should be inserted after the word applications save and except for any indemnity obligations of Quallaby set forth in Section above By not having this reference it is possible that section could be read to negate Quallabys obligations as set out in Section In Section of the Agreement a new paragraph should be added as paragraph to indicate as follows The provisions of Sections and shall survive any termination or expiration of this Agreement This is more so important now that Quallaby has included specific provisions enabling it to terminate the agreement upon a threat of an infringement claim With changes in the areas indicated above incorporated into the agreement we are prepared to move this matter forward Thanks for your continued assistance and cooperation Mark Original Message From DeZenzo Ray ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESDeZenzoCRayCrdezenzoquallabyEcomE NRONcom mailtoIMCEANOTESDeZenzoCRayCrdezenzoquallabyEcomE NRONcom Sent Monday September AM To Greenberg Mark Cc Shoup Rick Borchgrevink Jack Axbey Tom Subject Quallaby Evaluation Agreement Mark Attached youll find a clean and blackline version of the Evaluation Agreement We have accepted many of your changes and rearranged others If you have any questions or would like to discuss any component of the agreement please do not hesitate to contact me directly at Otherwise please arrange to execute original and fax it to me at for counter signing Thanks Ray DeZenzo CFO Quallaby Corporation Evaluation Agreement Enron DOC Evaluation Agreement Enron BLDOC Evaluation Agreement Enron DOC File Evaluation Agreement Enron DOC Evaluation Agreement Enron BLDOC File Evaluation Agreement Enron BLDOC This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you Evaluation Agreement Enron DOC Evaluation Agreement Enron DOC Evaluation Agreement Enron BLDOC Evaluation Agreement Enron BLDOC
